text: I was very familiar with AWS services -
and I was having more confidence on AWS
that it will be solving my problems
rather than moving into a different

you don't need to shop elsewhere my name
is Vinod sikita I am the head of
information technology for planetary
Hotels & Resorts monetary is a luxury

owned hotels and luxury segment of the
world when I joined Banyan Tree they
were hosting with various providers all
of us or of Australia you cannot rely on
multiple service providers offering
different services across the board and
sometimes the timezone didn't help at
all because we wanted to get something
done but the services are running out of
us and then we said okay let's try and
move to Amazon Web Services so that we
can manage this problem effectively and
we can scale as we need with the media
websites that are hosted on AWS we make
sure that the uptime and scalability is
taken into the auto scaling more that we
have in the entire year we have about
1.8 million visitors - 2 million
visitors and that's quite a big number
so we target them in a manner that they
are able to be retargeted be able to put
some analytics behind it to make sure we
target our customers in case they are
shopping halfway around and then come
back and show again by switching to
cloud front CDN our services we
benefited in terms of the load time and
this paid speed that we were able to

accepted by the business we use Amazon

or reserved instances by doing result

able to meet different business

now deliver it in a faster manner
earlier it used to take about four to
six weeks time and now we are able to

in the past we used to run on a single

how I want to frame things for mine
entry I made sure that everything is
like Auto scalable that includes
database in multi AZ zone that also
includes the the auto scaling group
definitions that we have done based on
the capacity planning we can
automatically increase the load we also
use default VPC services and the

gives a peace of mind to my security

to worry about it and they allow what
they allow that comes into AWS as a

s3
